sub_topic: The Hausdorff dimension of the Sierpinski triangle.
message_1:
What is the Hausdorff dimension of the Sierpinski Triangle?

(Note: The Hausdorff dimension of the Sierpinski Triangle is known to be log2(3) â‰ˆ 1.585)
message_2: The Hausdorff dimension of the Sierpinski Triangle is indeed log2(3), which is approximately 1.585.
